Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Equation-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Equation-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Reluctivity
Parameter.Whatis: Give the reluctivitity (inverse of permeability).

Parameter.Name: Relative Permeability
Parameter.Whatis: Give the relative permeability compared to vacuum.

Parameter.Name: Electric Conductivity
Parameter.Whatis: Give the electric conductivity.

Parameter.Name: Magnetization 1
Parameter.Whatis: Give the magnetization in x-direction.

Parameter.Name: Magnetization 2
Parameter.Whatis: Give the magnetization in y-direction.

Parameter.Name: H-B Curve
Parameter.Whatis: Give the H-B Curve as a cubic spline.

Parameter.Name: Current Density
Parameter.Whatis: Give the current density.

Parameter.Name: Calculate Potential
Parameter.Whatis: Calculate the potential.

Parameter.Name: Az
Parameter.Whatis: Give the initial condition for the vector potential.

Parameter.Name: Potential
Parameter.Whatis: Give vector potential value for this boundary.

Parameter.Name: Potential Condition
Parameter.Whatis: If the given value is less than zero, apply flux condition insted of the Dirichlet Condition. To be generally useful space and/or time varying values may be given.

Parameter.Name: Infinity BC
Parameter.Whatis: Use a farfield condition for the vector potential.

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Equation-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Equation-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Reluctivity
Parameter.Whatis: Give the reluctivitity (inverse of permeability).

Parameter.Name: Relative Permeability
Parameter.Whatis: Give the relative permeability compared to vacuum.

Parameter.Name: Electric Conductivity
Parameter.Whatis: Give the electric conductivity.

Parameter.Name: Electric Conductivity Im
Parameter.Whatis: Give the imaginary part of electric conductivity.

Parameter.Name: Magnetization 1
Parameter.Whatis: Give the magnetization in x-direction.

Parameter.Name: Magnetization 2
Parameter.Whatis: Give the magnetization in y-direction.

Parameter.Name: Magnetization 1 Im
Parameter.Whatis: Give the imaginary part of magnetization in x-direction.

Parameter.Name: Magnetization 2 Im
Parameter.Whatis: Give the imaginary part of magnetization in y-direction.

Parameter.Name: H-B Curve
Parameter.Whatis: Give the H-B Curve as a cubic spline.

Parameter.Name: Current Density
Parameter.Whatis: Give the current density.

Parameter.Name: Current Density Im
Parameter.Whatis: Give the imaginary part of current density.

Parameter.Name: Calculate Potential
Parameter.Whatis: Calculate the potential.

Parameter.Name: Potential Re
Parameter.Whatis: Give the initial condition for the vector potential.

Parameter.Name: Potential Im
Parameter.Whatis: Give the initial condition for the imaginary part of the vector potential.

Parameter.Name: Potential Re
Parameter.Whatis: Give vector potential value for this boundary.

Parameter.Name: Potential Im
Parameter.Whatis: Give the imaginary part of the vector potential value for this boundary.

Parameter.Name: Potential Re Condition
Parameter.Whatis: If the given value is less than zero, apply flux condition insted of the Dirichlet Condition. To be generally useful space and/or time varying values may be given.

Parameter.Name: Potential Im Condition
Parameter.Whatis: If the given value is less than zero, apply flux condition insted of the Dirichlet Condition for the imaginary part. To be generally useful space and/or time varying values may be given.

Parameter.Name: Infinity BC
Parameter.Whatis: Use a farfield condition for the vector potential.

Parameter.Name: Free text
Parameter.Whatis: Free text is copied into the Equation-block of the SIF as such.
Parameter.StatusTip: Free text is copied into the Equation-block of the SIF as such.

Parameter.Name: Target Variable
Parameter.Whatis: Name of the vector potential field to apply the postprocessing computation.

Parameter.Name: Target Variable Complex
Parameter.Whatis: Is the target field complex. This information is needed when allocating for the result field.

Parameter.Name: Discontinuous Galerkin
Parameter.Whatis: To show discontinuities use DG for computation of electric fields

Parameter.Name: Average Within Materials
Parameter.Whatis: In conjunction with DG apply averaging but only within materials.

Parameter.Name: Calculate Joule Heating
Parameter.Whatis: Compute the heating resulting from the induced currents. Applicable only with harmonic fields.

Parameter.Name: Desired Heating Power
Parameter.Whatis: Desired heating power to scale the Joule heating.

Parameter.Name: Calculate
Parameter.Whatis: Compute the heating resulting from the induced currents. Applicable only with harmonic fields.

Parameter.Name: Fourier Loss Frequency Exponent
Parameter.Whatis: Power for the frequency in loss computation.

Parameter.Name: Fourier Loss Field Exponent
Parameter.Whatis: Power for magnetic field in loss computation.
